meaningMnemonic: <radical>Rain</radical> on a <radical>rice paddy</radical> means only one thing... <kanji>thunder</kanji>! Get off the rice paddy! There's nothing but you to attract the thunder!
readingMnemonic: You can’t run fast enough to escape the <kanji>thunder</kanji>, so you decide to hide under a pile of… <reading>rye</reading> (らい)?!
